name: SLOMI
description:
You had experienced many adversities in your life, but that one are going to decide your fate. Would you survive on unknown land?
To find out, you will need to craft, build, defend yourself from monsters and gather resources
Become a truly colonizer and try to escape it, good luck lost soul.

  • Good Graphics
  • Addictive Gameplay
  • Long Story
  • Open World
